name: Camp Scamp
description: Camp Scamp is your trusted partner in discovering boutique, locally owned camps for your child. A platform that connects parents with carefully selected local camps offering diverse activities, including outdoor adventures, sports, arts, and technology. Whether your child dreams of exploring nature, honing a skill, or making new friends.
